title: Localization and Mapping
description: Robust state estimation for rovers and legged robots in extreme, GNSS-denied environments.

title: Multi‑Robot Systems
description: Swarm-based and distributed estimation for cooperative perception and navigation.

title: Physics‑Informed Estimation
description: Incorporate environmental and motion constraints to improve accuracy and robustness.

title: Terrain‑Aware Mobility
description: Slip-aware estimation and locomotion strategies for challenging terrains.

title: Mission Applications
description: Transition methods to real planetary missions and analog environments.
